text: Arrival of Everglow (stylised as Arrival of EVERGLOW) is the debut single album by South Korean girl group Everglow. The album was released digitally on March 18, 2019, and physically on March 19, 2019 by Yuehua Entertainment. The single album contains three tracks: "Moon," "D+1", and the lead single, "Bon Bon Chocolat". ==Background and release== On March 6, 2019, Yuehua Entertainment announced via SNS that Everglow would debut with the single album, Arrival of Everglow. Concept images featuring each of the members were released on March 8, 2019. The album contains three tracks: "Moon", the lead single "Bon Bon Chocolat", and "D+1".에버글로우 데뷔 D-1, '팬 사랑X고마움' 보이스 편지로 전해 The music video teaser was released on March 12 and the full music video on March 18. The choreography for "Bon Bon Chocolat" was made by Lia Kim.‘봉봉쇼콜라’ 리아킴X에버글로우 미친 댄스 콜라보 ==Promotion== Everglow held a live showcase at the Blue Square YES24 Live Hall on March 18, where they performed "Bon Bon Chocolat" along with "Moon" and "D+1".'데뷔' 에버글로우 "괴물신인 수식어 갖고파…신인상 욕심" The group started promoting the lead single "Bon Bon Chocolat" on March 21. They first performed the lead single on Mnet's M Countdown, followed by performances on KBS' Music Bank, MBC's Show!
